rulesStrings.li: r_logentry->[uncouthfixed]
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Hey, so…[RECIPIENT_nameDef]. If we were the last two people in the world. Would you…y’know?
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->I heard you’ve slept around a bit, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Nowt wrong with it, just thought you had, y’know, standards.
uncouthfixed->Hey, [RECIPIENT_nameDef] watch this. I can lick my elbow! Mlem…mleem…
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->Tch. I’ve got a real itch on my- ah...that's better.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Alright, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Let’s play shag, marry, avoid. Me, a [Animal], or me again?
uncouthfixed->*Scratches backside*
uncouthfixed->*Picks nose*
uncouthfixed->*Yawns loudly*
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->*Scratches genitals* That’s the spot…
uncouthfixed->It’s tough bein’ as smokin’ hot as me, but someone’s gotta do it…
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->*Wolfwhistles [RECIPIENT_nameDef]*
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->Yer looked a tad slimmer the last time I saw you, [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
uncouthfixed->I’m likin’ the new look, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. A bit of extra weight around the gut suits you.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Blimey, someone’s been dining out on one-too-many fine meals lately, huh, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
uncouthfixed->*Picks food out of teeth*
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->Psst, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. I’m not wearin’ any undies. Wanna see?
uncouthfixed->*Belches* Nice.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->*Stares at [RECIPIENT_nameDef]’s backside*
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Listen, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Have I ever told you about my updog?
uncouthfixed->Hey, [RECIPIENT_nameDef], I’m sorry to hear you caught ligma.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Heh, did you hear that [NAME]’s caught sugma?
uncouthfixed->Hubba hubba, [RECIPIENT_nameDef], yer lookin’ like a tasty snack today.
uncouthfixed->…Why the long face, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]? Oh, that's just how you look?
uncouthfixed->How’s it goin’, doll?
uncouthfixed->*Touches [RECIPIENT_nameDef]'s hair* It's so soft!
uncouthfixed->Look at the fivehead on you, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Could play noughts and crosses on that thing.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->C’mere, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]. Yer look like yer need a big hug.
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->Oh no, didn't you have enough time to brush your hair this morning, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]?
uncouthfixed->You’d look so much better if yer smiled more, [RECIPIENT_nameDef].
uncouthfixed->Dunno if I’ve ever told yer this, [RECIPIENT_nameDef], but you’re a solid 8. I wouldn’t go as far as 10, just on account of that massive nose, but still.
uncouthfixed->[RECIPIENT_nameDef], pull my finger.
uncouthfixed->Yaaawn…Oh, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]! I had a dream ‘bout you last night…
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityYesNo)->Hear me out…but ain’t Scythers kinda…y’know?
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->Riddle me this [RECIPIENT_nameDef], What’s white, sticky, and better to spit than to swallow? Toothpaste!
uncouthfixed(tag=RBSF_VulgarityReaction)->*Pats [RECIPIENT_nameDef]’s backside* Lookin’ good, [RECIPIENT_nameDef]!
uncouthfixed->*Mumbles* I really wish I beat one out this mornin’…
uncouthfixed->You look like a dumpster fire, [RECIPIENT_nameDef], and I'm ready to go dumpster diving.
